title: Advanced iron-specific spectroscopies for the study of iron-sulfur cluster transcriptional regulators
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The grant is still in its early stages and outputs from it have not yet emerged.
findingsText: The grant has allowed a new collaboration with the Cramer group at UC Davis, CA, USA to develop for the application of advanced iron-specific spectroscopies to the iron-sulfur regulatory systems that we study. We have successfully applied Mossbauer and nuclear resonance vibrational spectroscopy as well as EXAFS and this has provided important new insight. Manuscripts describing these findings are in preparation. Our findings are still in the preparation stages for publication. Other
